rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0001
rows.name: These ruins are quite remarkable.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0002
rows.name:
Indeed. This style of architecture
cannot be found in Superbia.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0003
rows.name:
There's plenty of ruins in Luxuria too,
but nothing quite like this.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0004
rows.name:
Must be something to do with
the Divine Beasts here.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0005
rows.name:
How would you even build a place
like this anyway?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0006
rows.name: I explained before, did I not?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0007
rows.name: Probably wasn't listening.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0008
rows.name:
Maybe it was before he joined
up with us?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0009
rows.name: Hmm... Was it? I can't recall.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0010
rows.name:
In any case, no harm in
repeating myself.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0011
rows.name:
The Liberalitan Archipelago consists of
a mountainous Cloud Sea formation and
numerous Divine Beasts gathered like islands.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0012
rows.name:
All of those smaller Divine Beasts are circling
around a much larger one...

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0013
rows.name:
But that larger Divine Beast is hidden
deep within the cloud mountains.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0014
rows.name:
So...looking at the size of these
ruins, we must be inside that
big Divine Beast right now?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0015
rows.name: Yes, precisely.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0016
rows.name: Wow, what a crazy sort of place.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0017
rows.name:
That doesn't answer the question of
how anyone made all this, though.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0018
rows.name:
I mean, I doubt they carried all this
rock through the Village Guardian...

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0019
rows.name:
Perhaps it was built before this
large Divine Beast submerged itself
in the Cloud Sea?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0020
rows.name:
Ah, that'd make sense. So back on the
surface, it was just like any other Divine Beast.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0021
rows.name:
Then at some point those cloud
mountains formed around it, creating
the Archipelago we know today.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0022
rows.name:
Yes, that would explain how
this place came to be.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0023
rows.name:
But even so, it would be very difficult
to build structures of this size today.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0024
rows.name: Indeed...

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0025
rows.name:
We have neither the labor forces
required, nor sufficient land available.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0026
rows.name:
I doubt Superbia, Invidia, or Luxuria
could construct something like this
in today's climate.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0027
rows.name: ...Saika.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0028
rows.name:
When I die, you don't have to build a
monument this grand for me,okay?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0029
rows.name:
I'm gonna be gone as soon as
you are, you know!

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0030
rows.name:
Besides, I don't think you need a
gravestone. A snowman'll do for you,
heheh!

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0031
rows.name:
Where am I being buried,
Teos Aure Rear Gate?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0032
rows.name:
Though a snowman does sound
pretty nice.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0033
rows.name: You're fine with that...?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0034
rows.name:
Anyway, while we're talking
about graves...

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0035
rows.name: Who should I ask?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0036
rows.name: Where's your grave gonna be, Rex?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0037
rows.name: Where's your grave gonna be, Meleph?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0101
rows.name: My grave?!

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0102
rows.name: I...guess I've never thought about it.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0103
rows.name: You're still pretty young, after all.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0104
rows.name: You calling me old?!

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0105
rows.name:
I guess I'd probably like to be buried
alongside my parents in Iyasaki.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0106
rows.name: How would you fancy here in Elpys?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0107
rows.name: Uh... I don't know about that...

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0108
rows.name:
Yeah, this place is so big and empty,
you'd die of loneliness.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0109
rows.name: After he's already dead?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0110
rows.name:
I think I'd rather stay close to the
people I love. Though it's still pretty
weird to think about.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0111
rows.name: Well, that's a nice way of looking at it.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0201
rows.name: My manner of burial is already decided.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0202
rows.name: There is a proud Superbian tradition to-

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0203
rows.name:
Yeah,okay, I'm gonna stop you there.
Thanks for the predictable answer.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0205
rows.name:
Then ask me again. I will endeavor to
make my response more entertaining.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0206
rows.name:
Meleph-sama, I don't think there
is any need to-

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0207
rows.name:
You are aware of how I dislike
to be outdone, are you not?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0208
rows.name: All right, let's do this.

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0209
rows.name: Where's your grave going to be?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0210
rows.name: A snowman at Teos Aure Rear Gate!

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0212
rows.name:
Wait, are you gonna marry into
Luxuria royalty or something?

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0213
rows.name:
Wha...?! Of course I will not! I was just
imitating Zeke's amusing remark...

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0214
rows.name:
Perhaps I should have chosen
a grave in Iyasaki instead!

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0215
rows.name: Whaaa?!

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0216
rows.name: That's also not exactly, er...

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0217
rows.name: Ugh!

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0218
rows.name:
Hahahah! Looks like Meleph's
got a thing or two to learn when
it comes to the funnies!

rows.label: kizunatalk036_msg0219
rows.name:
Ah, to be young and carefree again.
To think they can joke around in a
place like this...
